pers.yujie.dashboard.controller

Class ConfigController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pers.yujie.dashboard.controller.ConfigController

  • @Controller
public class ConfigController
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the Controller related to the config (index) page. The business logic is in ConfigService.
    Since:
    02/02/2023
